messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Mother's Edition 67. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: This is the captain of the S.S Enterprise I just hope you dont manage to kill yourselves with your jobs

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Im the biggest gay captain in the world

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you see Tyrone Negrone eliminate him

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
